title: From Sequins to Sunshine - Year One
description: Lorna Penfold moved to rural Andalucia with her partner Alan in January 2008, having been a dance teacher for thirty years. They moved to start a new life breeding alpacas. Lorna started an online blog to keep track of her day to day life. Nearly six years down the line and Lorna has decided to make the first year of their new life available for everyone to read. Lorna's new life is full of ups and heartbreaking downs, but through it all she is determined not to let this new life get the better of her.
author: Lorna Penfold
